column3: None of that, not while you're living under my roof
Look, just because I know about you two, doesn't mean I like looking at it
Aren't you supposed to be at an audition for another hour
Well, I'm sorry if I'm not a middle-aged black woman
And I'm also sorry if sometimes I go to the wrong audition
Okay, look, if I have to pretend I don't know about you two, then you two are gonna have to pretend there's nothing to know about
Yeah, my mom sent me a family heirloom that once belonged to my grandmother
A year ago I didn't even have a family, and now I have heirlooms for crying out loud
Why would my mother send me a fur
Doesn't she know me but at all
Plus, I have a perfectly fine coat that no innocent animal suffered to make
Yeah, just some 9-year-old Filipino kids who worked their fingers bloody for 12 cents an hour
That didn't happen, I made that up
You can't put up flyers in here
Oh, umm, I'm just getting rid of a couple of things
This is all of your things
No, but it's good it's—Emily thinks we should get all new stuff
So basically, this is a getting-rid-of-everything-Rachel-ever-used sale
Hey, Ross, you're okay with that
Look, if I can just do what Emily wants and get her to New York, I'm sure everything will be fine
Okay, but don't you think this is a little extreme
When my friend Silvie's husband said someone else's name in bed, she cursed him and turned his thingy green
What, Emily, thinks Ross's furniture has got Rachel coodies
Everything's gettin' all messed up, y'know
Emily won't let Ross see Rachel, we're not gonna stop seeing Rachel, hence Ross stops seeing us
Yeah I know, we're losing Ross, Joey said hence…
Look, I'm not happy about this either, but y'know if-if Ross says he's happy then we're just gonna have to keep our feelings about Emily to ourselves
But y'know, I'm an actor, I'll act cool
Storage rooms give me the creeps
Monica, come on please hurry up honey
Rachel, if you want the little round waffles, you gotta have to wait until I find the little waffle iron
I want the little round waffles
Right underneath the can of-of bug bomb
I wonder if the best place to put something that cooks food is underneath the can of poison
I don't know what I'm gonna do about this coat
All right, what do you think
No-no-no, it's just a bit sudden
I love you too, all righty
I just got off the phone with Emily and it looks like I'm moving to a new apartment
Well, her thought is, and I agree, fresh new furniture, why not a fresh new apartment
Her cousin has this great place to sublet, it's got a view of the river on one side and Columbia on the other
I love to ride that rail
So you're really okay with this
I mean it's-it's kinda far from work, but uh, y'know, I'll get so much done on the commute
I-I've been given the gift of time
Now that's so funny, because last Christmas I got the gift of space
We should get them together and make a continuum
Man, what is Emily doing to him
We were, we were just in the storage area and we saw this really creepy man
It was like this crazy-eyed, hairy beast man
He was like a, like a bigfoot or a yeti or something
And he came at us with an axe, so Rachel had to use a bug bomb on him
Yeah, I-I-I just pulled the tab and I just fogged his yeti ass
Uhh, like dark hair, bushy beard
Yeah, he just got back from like this four-month trek in the Andes
Y'know, you always stick up for the people we fog
You might not remember us, but we are the girls that fogged you
We're-we're really sorry we fogged you
Just so you know, we-we didn't mean to fog you, we thought you were like a yeti or something
Sorry to bother you, but I don't think we can accept your acceptance of our apology, it just doesn't really seem like you mean it
I mean you'd forgive me if I fogged you
Well you did a little bit
Oh my God, honey, I'm so sorry
So listen, you know my friend Chris who owns the crematorium
He says, that he would cremate my fur coat for free if I umm, y'know, bring in the next person I know who dies
Oh my God, look at these pelts
Don't get too attached, she's having it cremated
Uhh, Phoebe, honey, honey, I know you're quirky and I get a big kick out of it, we all do actually, but if you destroy a coat like this that is like a crime against nature
Okay, so to you, death is fashion
Here's Phoebe umm, sporting uh, y'know, cutting edge hairy carcass from y'know, the steal traps of wintry Russia
I mean, you really thing this looks good
I know I miss you too
I can't wait to see you
No-no, this is my collection of fossil samples
I'm really gonna miss this apartment
Y'know, Ben-Ben took his first steps right over there
Hey, remember when I ran into this thing  and it kinda knocked me out a little
To tell you the truth, I wish I didn't have to move
Uhh, are you saying that you're not entirely happy about this
Well, I mean if uh, if Emily gave me a choice…
Ross, why are you listening to her
It's not right what Emily wants you to do
Look, now you guys said I only had to keep my mouth shut as long as Ross was happy, right
Well he just told me that he's not entirely happy
No, Ross, we do not hate Emily
We-we just, we just think that you're having to sacrifice a whole lot to make her happy
Look, we just think that maybe she's being a little unreasonable
How about we have this conversation when one of you guys gets married
You have no idea what it takes to make a marriage work
Because it's not all laughing, happy, candy in the sky, drinking coffee at Central Perk all the time
You guys hang out at the coffeehouse way too much
God, I feel so guilty about Ross
I kinda feel like it's my fault
If you just kept this to yourself none of this would've happened
Well, I'm keeping so many things to myself these days, something was bound to slip out
Well, I think it's very brave what you said
All right, I can't sit here anymore
Pheebs, what are you doing with the coat
How about the whole animal rights thing
Well, I've been reading up and for your information, minks are not very nice
Okay, I—it's the best thing I've ever had wrapped around me, including Phil Huntley
So you like the short hair better
I had to cut my hair to get rid of the uh, fogger smell
I would, I would've never fogged you if y'know if you hadn't looked so…
Some people are just into appearances
Come on, you got the shopping bags and the Sack's catalog
So from that you think you've got me all figured out
Y'know I-I could have toys for underprivileged kids in here
Well, y'know, if-if kids like to play with Capri pants
And you are worse because you are sticking to your stupid snap judgement
You can't even open up your mind for a second to see if you're wrong
What does that say about you
The pizza-place across the street any good
You can keep yelling if there's more
Are you still mad at us
Because we have an "I'm sorry" song
I'm really not in the mood
Look, Ross, I feel really bad
I mean, you're going through all this stuff and I just acted like a jerk
You're kinda stepping on the song
Look, we were way out of line, we totally support you
Whatever you decide, whatever you do
Okay, now you're just taking lines right out of the song
I really need you guys right now
Why don't you come over tonight
And I'll make you favorite dinner
Okay, let's get some perspective people; it's not like I'm wearing a seeing-eye dog coat
Hey, y'know Ross, I think I kinda understand why I kinda lost it today
Yeah you see umm, well, I'm an actor
So I gotta keep my emotions right at the surface y'know
I gotta lot of balls in the air
Guys like me, y'know, you wander around, you're alone…
Oh, I went to have pizza
That yeti is one smooth talker
I hope you're not full, 'cause dinner's almost ready
Yeah, y'know I-I think I'm just gonna hang out in my room
Listen, if Emily knew I was here having dinner you with you she would flip out and you know it
It's okay, I really… I don't mind
It uh… It would really mean a lot to me if you stayed
You see Rach I'm an actor…
I haven't seen him in so long
Oh God, I really missed that fat bastard
I just realized this might be the last time we'll all be hanging out together
It's almost as if he knew
Yeah, uh you-you tracked him down
Uh, yeah, sure uh hold on
So who am I saying hello too
Well uh, I don't know about who's here, but I can tell you for damn sure who's not here and that's Rachel
Ross knows better than that by now
How can you do this too me
I thought I'd made my feelings about Rachel perfectly clear
Look Emily, I'm just having dinner with my friends, okay
You obviously can't keep away from her
Look, I'm-I'm moving for you, I'm cutting friends out of my life for you
Please, just get on the plane and come to New York
Okay, you'll see you're the only person I want to be with
I'll feel better when I'm there, and I can know where you are all the time
Well, you can't know where I am all the time
Look, this marriage is never gonna work if you don't trust me
You can only see the back of his head
Ross, honey, is there anything we can do
You can help me get my furniture back from Gunther
And y'know, okay, most of these probably wanted to be coats
All right, fine, now I get it
